EvidenceResponse.Name: Evidence response for participation in a criminal organisation conviction.
EvidenceResponse.Remarks: A combination of different types of Evidences captured from e-Certis is used.

Criterion.cbc:Name: Participation in a criminal organisation
Criterion.cbc:Description: Has the economic operator itself or any person who is a member of its administrative, management or supervisory body or has powers of representation, decision or control therein been the subject of a conviction by final judgment for participation in a criminal organisation, by a conviction rendered at the most five years ago or in which an exclusion period set out directly in the conviction continues to be applicable? As defined in Article 2 of Council Framework Decision 2008/841/JHA of 24 October 2008 on the fight against organised crime (OJ L 300, 11.11.2008, p. 42).

cccev:Evidence.dct:title: Certificate of conviction
cccev:Evidence.dct:description: Certificate listing all past convictions for the last 10 years.

cccev:Concept.cbc:Description: Length of the period of exclusion?
Have you taken measures to demonstrate your reliability (Self-Cleaning)?

Criterion.cbc:Name: General yearly turnover
Criterion.cbc:Description: Its general yearly turnover for the number of financial years required in the relevant notice, the in the ESPD, the relevant notice or the ESPD is as follows:

cccev:Requirement.cbc:Name: National Criterion 1
cccev:Requirement.cbc:Description: Subcriterions are used to specify National Criteria, which get their UUIDs from e-Certis.

cccev:Concept.cbc:Name: Catalan language requirement.
cccev:Concept.cbc:Description: Is the Economic Operator able to produce documentation in Catalan language?
An Amount, and currency, as defined in UN/CEFACT's CCTS.

Criterion.cbc:Name: Average yearly turnover
Criterion.cbc:Description: Its average yearly turnover for the number of years required in the relevant notice, the procurement documents or the ESPD is as follows:.

cccev:Requirement.cbc:Name: National Criterion 2
cccev:Requirement.cbc:Description: Subcriterions are used to specify National Criteria, which get their UUIDs from e-Certis.

cccev:Concept.cbc:Name: Research and Development Investment.
cccev:Concept.cbc:Description: Has the Economic Operator invested at least 2% of its revenues in Research and Development during the last 5 years?
A non-negative integer representing a year. The unit has to be specified as YEAR.
An Amount, and currency, as defined in UN/CEFACT's CCTS.

cccev:Value.cccev:TextValue: The Economic Operator has also taken out a loan to have enough liquidity for the tender.

Evidence.dct:title: Gross revenue
Evidence.dct:description: This certifies the gross revenue of the company during the chosen fiscal years..

Evidence.dct:title: Taxation authority certificate
Evidence.dct:description: This certificates that the holder has no debts with the taxation authorities

Evidence.dct:title: Social security payments
Evidence.dct:description: This certificates the amount pay to the social security.

Evidence.dct:title: Tax declaration
Evidence.dct:description: This certificates the tax payment to the authorities during the last five years.

Evidence.dct:title: Income certificate
Evidence.dct:description: This certificates the economic operator's revenues the last three years.

Evidence.dct:title: Bank accound balance certificate
Evidence.dct:description: This certificates the current balance of the Economic Operator's bank account.
